Question: On 12 September 2007, this person dissolved the government upon the request of Prime Minister Mikhail Fradkov.
Hints: Though his father was a "militant atheist", this person's mother "was a devoted Orthodox believer".
In April 2008, this person was put on the Time 100 most influential people in the world list.
From 1994 to 1997, this person was appointed to other positions in Saint Petersburg.
